Headline: #49 Western Temporary Reroute at Western/32nd
ShortDescription: 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 35th, Damen, Blue Island and Western: due to, police activity near Western/32nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Western, 35th, Damen, Blue Island, Western and over regular route, due to police activity near Western/32nd.

Allow extra travel time.
